segments.text: I see the woman standing at the sink, focused intently on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron is neat, and she seems completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But there’s something alarming about the water overflowing the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It creates a puddle at her feet, but she doesn’t seem to notice at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the gentle sound of the water splashing on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside through the window looks so peaceful and tidy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how she could be so unaware of the chaos building around her.
segments.speaker: PAR
